code: import axios from'axios';var timeout=5000;var localhost="http://localhost:80";var currentDate=new Date();export default{getAllProblems:function getAllProblems(){var allProblemsUrl="".concat(localhost,"/api/problems");return axios.get(allProblemsUrl,{timeout:timeout});},createNewProblem:function createNewProblem(description,author){var createProblemsUrl="".concat(localhost,"/api/problems");return axios.post(createProblemsUrl,{author:author,description:description,createdAt:currentDate,updatedAt:currentDate});}};
